list_definition.definition: the weather conditions of a region (temperature, moisture etc)
the conditions in a country etc

list_ex_of_english: The higher is this ratio the lower is the heat loss, so larger bodies (with higher x) are more beneficial in cold climates.
Given its extensive geographical range, this predator is locally adapted to a variety of climates.
The diversity of climates seemed to require a diversity of personal characteristics, and personal rights.
I think it should be the starting point for environmental design in temperate climates.
In temperate climates most people acquire the infection during childhood.
In temperate climates in the absence of vaccine, the lifetime risk for varicella is over 95 % [1].
Nothing in our account precludes "empirical research on fossils, artefacts, genes, and climates" as these relate to religious beliefs and practices.
We would expect hominids to show less response to fluctuating climates than other mammals show.
